channel.title: scientists on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in scientists on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-22
item.description: Alphabet is putting its prototype robots to work cleaning up around Googleâ€™s offices (3 minute read) Alphabet’s Everyday Robots Project team has released some of its prototype machines onto Google’s Bay Area campuses to carry out light custodial tasks.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-29
item.description: YouTube wins naming rights for 6,000-seat event venue at Hollywood Park (2 minute read) YouTube Theater is a new live event venue in Inglewood, California.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-03
item.description: Apple Watch Could Gain Breakthrough Health Upgrade (2 minute read) Rockley Photonics produces sensors for the Apple Watch.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-12
item.description: Elon Musk’s brain-chip company, Neuralink, released a video of a monkey playing video games with its mind (3 minute read) Neuralink released a video last week that showed a macaque monkey using wireless neural interface tech to play video games.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-05
item.description: Virgin Hyperloop selects West Virginia to test its futuristic transport system (2 minute read) Virgin Hyperloop One will build a $500 million certification center in West Virginia.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-30
item.description: Google brings Halloween to life using augmented reality (3 minute read) Google has updated its augmented reality models on Google search with Halloween-themed options.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-02
item.description: Google discontinues the Pixel 3A and 3A XL (2 minute read) Google has discontinued the Pixel 3A and 3A XL smartphones.
